'''''Mallorn'' 35''' is the thirty-fifth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s  journal ''[[Mallorn (journal)|Mallorn]]'', published in September [[1997]].

==Contents==
* '''Cover Art'''
** By: [[Pauline Baynes]]
* '''Editorial'''
** By: [[Patricia Reynolds|Pat Reynolds]] and [[John Ellison]]
* '''Articles'''
** The Balrog Report
*** By: Hibernia
** Problems of Good and Evil in Tolkien's ''The Lord of the Rings''
*** By: Craig Clark
** 'The Hill at Hobbiton' Vernacular Architecture in the Shire
*** By: [[Patricia Reynolds]]
* '''Reviews'''
** ''Lembas Extra 1995'' and ''Lembas Extra 1996''
*** By: Jessica Yates
** ''[[Defending Middle-Earth]]''
*** By: [[John Ellison]]
** ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien (Writers and Their Work)|J.R.R. Tolkien]]''
*** By: Sarah Wells
* '''Articles'''
** Tolkien's Trees
*** By: Claudia Riiff Rinseth
** The Shire and Notting Hill
*** By: Michael Foster
** Tolkien and Space Travel - Part Two
*** By: Anthony Appleyard
* '''Contributors'''
* '''Inside Art'''
** By: Gordon Palmer, Sergei Iukhimov
